short_summary: Engagement sessions with energy system actors
description: NRCan is seeking a qualified contractor to undertake a series of engagement sessions with downstream energy system actors...
duration_in_months: Well, essentially, we would need to have a machine learning-based approach that can map the relationships between all the fields. We can achieve this by representing all the fields as nodes in a graph. Each field could be represented as an individual node, and the dependencies or relationships between these fields could be represented as edges in the graph.
full_summary:
# Energy Studies Tender Announcement
## Reference Number: cb-8433-81267144
### Description
Natural Resources Canada (NRCan) is seeking a qualified contractor to conduct engagement sessions with downstream energy system actors across Canada. The contractor will examine specific actor needs for approximately 6 months, identifying regulatory challenges and opportunities to leverage or develop to address these challenges systemically through federal programming.

### Tender Details
| Key Information | Description |
| --- | --- |
| Reference Number | cb-8433-81267144 |
| Solicitation Number | 5000073423 |
| Tender Closing Date | 2023-10-10T14:00:00 |
| Notice Type | Request for Proposal |
| Procurement Method | Competitive - Open bidding |
| Selection Criteria | Highest Combined Rating of Technical Merit and Price |
| GSIN Code | None |
| UNSPSC Code | Environmental sciences advisory services (77101701) |

### Eligibility
This tender is open to all qualified contractors. The tender description invites contractors to submit their proposals in response to the engagement sessions' objectives.

### Contact Information
- **Name:** Mathew Star
- **Email:** [mathew.star@nrcan-rncan.gc.ca](mailto:mathew.star@nrcan-rncan.gc.ca)
- **Phone:** (613) 222-9067
- **Address:** 506 Burnside Road W, Victoria, BC, V8Z 1M5, Canada

### Attachments
Please note that attachments are subject to the original tender notice. The attachments include:
- Revision to the tender notice (corection to a number) dated September 21, 2023.

### Trade Agreements
This tender is covered by Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP), Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA), World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA), Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA), Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, and Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement.

### Notice Details
- **Publication Date:** 2023-08-24
- **Tender Status:** Expiration
